chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: When will our order finally arrive? Thank you for your help,

Hello, 
My product is iPhone 13 Pro and it has the above problem: 
When will our order finally arrive? 
Thank you very much for your help,

Hello!


The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customer's ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.


Once all the paperwork has been gathered, we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents.

If at any point the delivery begins to move again, a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Tania - Back Market

Hi!

The package hasn't been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost package policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been provided by the customer and shared in this conversation.

You can use the documents in the details to look into the matter with your delivery company

 We will allow 5 business days for you to complete the investigation with the shipping provider. After that, unless a fraud is detected, this order will be refunded.

You can now block the device remotely, if possible.

All the best,
Tania, Back Market Customer Care

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Tania Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

As your messages of the lost parcel was marked as "No need to reply", we were unable to receive notifications of the message and were hence unaware about the situation. In the future, kindly do not mark messages like this "No need to reply" as we will be unable to receive notifications for the order and the investigation will be delayed. 

For this case, we have informed our logistics partner regarding the issue. Kindly give us 5 more business days to work on the investigation as it is unfair that we were not notified of the situation. Do not refund the customer please. 

Regards,
JH

Dear Backcare,

We have informed out logistics partners. Will update you soon once we receive notification. Thank you.

Regards,
KW

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded the customer.


Kind regards, Tania from Back Market
